resources.string: Completed on-campus studies and currently taking distance education courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science (Available for full-time W2 employment).

Language: C#, Java, JavaScript, PL/SQL 
Frameworks/web: .NET, Spring(Boot, MVC, Security), Hibernate, JDBC 
Microservices/Cloud: AWS, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka 
Databases: Oracle, PL/SQL, MySQL, MongoDB 
Tools: Intellij IDE, Maven, GitHub, GitLab, UML

Skilled full stack developer with a demonstrated history of 5 years in the Information Technology and software services industry, contributing to the development of major applications using modern SDLC methods. I am able to write efficient, reliable code which meets industry standards and allows for high performance and ease of maintenance. I have a proven knowledge of advanced technologies, including C#, Java for backend and React, Javascript and Jquery in frontend. I am excited to be a part of your team to build a good project and to solve every problem working together as a team.
